subject: Invoice missing for January
content: Hi support, I can't find the invoice for our January subscription in the billing portal. Can you send it to me? Thanks, John.
hey, how do i change my password? cant find it in settings

subject: API Rate Limits
content: We are hitting 429 errors on the task creation endpoint. What are the limits for the Pro plan?
expected_action: Explain API limits, suggest Enterprise plan if needed

subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
content: Hello TeamFlow, our team loves the tool but we really need a Dark Mode for late-night work. Is this on the roadmap?
URGENT! The site is down and we have a deadline. Fix it NOW!
expected_action: Escalate to engineering/status check, reassure customer

subject: Refund Request
content: I forgot to cancel my trial and was charged. I haven't used the tool. Please refund.
expected_action: Escalate to billing/human agent (Policy: refunds escalated)

subject: SAML SSO Setup
content: We are upgrading to Enterprise. Where is the documentation for setting up SAML with Okta?
can i add a guest user to just one board?

subject: Integration with Jira?
content: Do you have a native integration with Jira Software?

subject: Legal question about data residency
content: Our legal team needs to know if our data is stored in the EU. If not, we cannot use TeamFlow.
